level.heading: CITATIONS FOR SECONDARY TIER VIOLATIONS (ยง 23-804)

level.text: ABRA investigators or MPD Officers shall issue citations, pursuant to D.C. Official Code ยง 25-801(b), for secondary tier violations as follows:
For the first secondary tier violation, the fine shall be $250.
For the second secondary tier violation within two years, the fine shall be $500.
For the third secondary tier violation within three years, the fine shall be $750.

For the fourth secondary tier violation within four years, the fine shall be $1,000. Every subsequent secondary tier offense within five years of the first shall be fined according to the schedule for primary tier violation citations set forth in ยง 803 of this title.
